summary: After WW1, an ex-pilot takes up barn-storming and chance-meets a former German ace fighter pilot with whom he co-stars in Hollywood war movies depicting aerial dog-fights.
cast: Robert Redford|Bo Svenson|Bo Brundin|Susan Sarandon|Geoffrey Lewis|Edward Herrmann|Philip Bruns|Roderick Cook|Kelly Jean Peters|Margot Kidder|Scott Newman|James S. Appleby|Patrick W.
